short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension load original page after article view is loaded in new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This lets you either open a page from Pocket web normally, or you can use your browser's normal way to open the link to the page in a new tab, and this extension will automatically "click" the "View Original" button in that new tab
